mapper.select: select terminal_id, terminal_type, terminal_name, comm_fac_id, equip_id, equip_type, org_id, run_date, update_date, file_date, feeder_id, function_type, obj_id, pms_id, delflag, deldate, ssfzx, run_status, country_id, is_online, factory_name, terminal_status from accounting.das_terminal where terminal_id = #{terminalId}

select terminal_id, terminal_type, terminal_name, comm_fac_id, equip_id, equip_type, org_id, run_date, update_date, file_date, feeder_id, function_type, obj_id, pms_id, delflag, deldate, ssfzx, run_status, country_id, is_online, factory_name, terminal_status from accounting.das_terminal limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into accounting.das_terminal(terminal_type, terminal_name, comm_fac_id, equip_id, equip_type, org_id, run_date, update_date, file_date, feeder_id, function_type, obj_id, pms_id, delflag, deldate, ssfzx, run_status, country_id, is_online, factory_name, terminal_status) values (#{terminalType}, #{terminalName}, #{commFacId}, #{equipId}, #{equipType}, #{orgId}, #{runDate}, #{updateDate}, #{fileDate}, #{feederId}, #{functionType}, #{objId}, #{pmsId}, #{delflag}, #{deldate}, #{ssfzx}, #{runStatus}, #{countryId}, #{isOnline}, #{factoryName}, #{terminalStatus})
mapper.update:
update accounting.das_terminal
terminal_type = #{terminalType},
terminal_name = #{terminalName},
comm_fac_id = #{commFacId},
equip_id = #{equipId},
equip_type = #{equipType},
org_id = #{orgId},
run_date = #{runDate},
update_date = #{updateDate},
file_date = #{fileDate},
feeder_id = #{feederId},
function_type = #{functionType},
obj_id = #{objId},
pms_id = #{pmsId},
delflag = #{delflag},
deldate = #{deldate},
ssfzx = #{ssfzx},
run_status = #{runStatus},
country_id = #{countryId},
is_online = #{isOnline},
factory_name = #{factoryName},
terminal_status = #{terminalStatus},
where terminal_id = #{terminalId}
